title: Samsung starts shipping Galaxy S22 orders in US, UK, other regions
content:
Samsung revealed the Galaxy S22 series of smartphones and the Tab S8 lineup of high-end tablets earlier this month, and pre-orders started as soon as the Galaxy Unpacked event ended on February 9. The official release date for the S22 series is February 25, and the first wave of pre-order shipments are supposed to arrive by that

The post Samsung starts shipping Galaxy S22 orders in US, UK, other regions appeared first on xda-developers.
description: If you purchased a Galaxy S22 phone shortly after pre-orders went live, it's time to check your email inbox.
